## CounterStyleRenderer.withFallback() method

Create a new renderer with a fallback used when the index is out of bounds.

See https://www.w3.org/TR/css-counter-styles-3/\#counter-style-fallback

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withFallback(fallback: CounterStyleRenderer | StrictCounterFormatter): CounterStyleRenderer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fallback | [CounterStyleRenderer](./counter-style.counterstylerenderer.md) \| [StrictCounterFormatter](./counter-style.strictcounterformatter.md) | A fallback CounterStyleRenderer or a formatter function. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CounterStyleRenderer](./counter-style.counterstylerenderer.md)
